# The `PathCanonicalizer` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Helper utility that encapsulates the logic for canonicalizing a virtual path and a path to copy from. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Helper utility that encapsulates the logic for canonicalizing a virtual path and a path to copy from.

## Private Member Functions

### updateWithRealPath() {#af61f735fca52ae4d0bc670910d1a88bb}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void FileCollector::PathCanonicalizer::updateWithRealPath (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; char &gt; &amp; Path)</>}>
Replace with a (mostly) real path, or don&#39;t modify.

Resolves symlinks in the directory, using <em>CachedDirs</em> to avoid redundant lookups, but leaves the filename as a possible symlink.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/filecollector-h/#l00087">87</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/filecollector-h">FileCollector.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/filecollector-cpp/#l00058">58</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/filecollector-cpp">FileCollector.cpp</a>.
